newsArray.title: India Women vs Sri Lanka Women Live Score 1st T20I: India Aim To Make Winning Return After World Cup Glory; Check Toss Timings
newsArray.description: IND W vs SL W Live Score 1st T20I: Hello and welcome to the live coverage of the first T20I between the India women's cricket team and the Sri Lanka women's cricket team. After their success in the 2025 ODI World Cup, India are now aiming to win the 2026 T20 World Cup. And their journey to the tournament will kick off with the home game against SL. India have reached the final of the T20 WC too and they have what it takes to win the T20 WC.The onus will be on Smriti Mandhana and Shafali Verma at the top of the order. Shafali was India's star batter in the final against Australia and she will have a big responsibility on the road to the WC. The T20I squad includes majority of players who participated in the ODI WC.Toss and pitch report: The toss will take place at 6:30 PM IST while the match will start at 7:00 PM IST. The pitch should be full of runs.Squads:India Women: Harmanpreet Kaur (Captain), Smriti Mandhana, Shafali Verma, Harleen Deol, Jemimah Rodrigues, Deepti Sharma, Richa Ghosh, Sneh Rana, Amanjot Kaur, Kranti Gaud, Renuka Singh Thakur, Shree Charani, Arundhati Reddy, Vaishnavi Sharma, G KamaliniSri Lanka Women: Chamari Athapaththu (Captain), Vishmi Gunaratne, Hasini Perera, Harshitha Samarawickrama, Kavisha Dilhari, Nilakshi de Silva, Kaushani Nuthyangana, Rashmika Sewwandi, Imesha Dulani, Kawya Kavindi, Nimesha Madushani, Malki Madara, Inoka Ranaweera, Malsha Shehani, Shashini Gimhani
keywords: sri lanka women vs india women
india women vs sri lanka women
ind w vs sl w live commentary
india women vs sri lanka women live score
ind w vs sl w 1st t20i
creator: times now digital
